name: Edmont's Harrowing Horrors - Adventure Resources
description:
A spooky supplement for DnD 5e, Edmont's Harrowing Horrors - Adventure Resources contains the following new goodies that are sure to delight, spook, and fright:

  • 11 new creatures spanning CRs 1/2 to 23
  • 16 new spells from cantrips to 9th level
  • 10 new magic items
